properties.entry: SELECT CAMP_NAME, ADDRESS, NATURAL_ATTRI FROM CAMP_INFO CI JOIN CAMP_NATURAL CN USING (CAMP_NO) JOIN "NATURAL" NA ON (CN.NATURAL_NO = NA.NATURAL_NO)
SELECT CAMP_NAME, ADDRESS, NATURAL_ATTRI FROM CAMP_INFO CI JOIN CAMP_NATURAL CN USING (CAMP_NO) JOIN "NATURAL" NA ON (CN.NATURAL_NO = NA.NATURAL_NO) WHERE CI.LOCATION_1 = ? AND CI.LOCATION_2 = ?
SELECT CAMP_NAME, ADDRESS, NATURAL_ATTRI FROM CAMP_INFO CI JOIN CAMP_NATURAL CN USING (CAMP_NO) JOIN "NATURAL" NA ON (CN.NATURAL_NO = NA.NATURAL_NO) WHERE NATURAL_ATTRI = ?;
